channel.title: 🏢 AI Graduate School GIST on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 AI Graduate School GIST on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Simple yet Universal Framework for Depth Completion
item.description: UniDC framework achieves universal depth completion across various sensors and scenes using minimal labeled data, leveraging a foundation model and hyperbolic embedding for enhanced generalization.
